name: Hērē
description:
Hērē | #CryptOlimpianos | Watercolor and nankin on 200g cotton paper| 2021 | Size 2000x2752 px 

Hērē is my interpretation of Hera, the matriarch goddess, queen of all gods. My Here is absolutely queer and fierce, an entity from another world, a cosmic alien being, they children are infinite lights.

"A story about the world? Yes, yes, we know one"
This is how the journey of the artists to show their vision about the Greek Gods and their form begins.

Part of the #Cryptoamigues #CryptOlimpianos a collaborative event by artists based in Brazil.
